text: It wasn't a zip safari, but a zip drive. I was stuck in traffic for an hour, unable to move, because I saw a leopard that was barely visible. The next morning, I went to the market and was happy to see more animals.

Sri Lanka's largest wildlife park is located in Yala. In this place, you can see wild animals like elephants, deer, crocodiles, hyenas, peacocks, leopards, etc. in the forest in the early morning.

Entrance start at 6am and safaris end at 6pm. It possible to do full day safaris or half day safaris. For half days, safari start at 2pm. I would recommend going in the morning as more animals come out for water.
